thread.title: Open consultation: Extending first MOT date to 4 years
thread.title_full: Open consultation: Extending first MOT date to 4 years

title: Open consultation: Extending first MOT date to 4 years
text:
Extending first MOT date to 4 years From: 21 March 2017, see all updates 
This consultation closes at 11:45pm on 16 April 2017 Summary Seeking views on extending the date of the first MOT from 3 to 4 years. Documents PDF , 841KB , 34 pages This file may not be suitable for users of assistive technology. Request an accessible format. If you use assistive technology (such as a screen reader) and need a version of this document in a more accessible format, please email . Please tell us what format you need. It will help us if you say what assistive technology you use. Consultation description 
We are seeking views on proposals for extending the date of a vehicleâ€™s first MOT date from 3 to 4 years. This includes asking if the change should apply to: all vehicles all vehicles except small vans Ways to respond
